name: Cute Dragon Fire Age Jump: Country Escape
name_original: Cute Dragon Fire Age Jump: Country Escape
description:
*This is the SWEETEST, high flying game you'll ever play!!

*Travel to a far away land where Awesome Dragons Rule ALL!!

*See How far you can fly with added boosters and power packs

* Collect coins to boost your score and unlock awesome power ups !!

* Don't forget to tell your FRIENDS how AWESOME this game is using the Facebook link!
